Judul: A Techno-economic Model for Heating of a Greenhouse Site Using Waste Heat
Abstrak:
Considering a greenhouse site, a waste-to-heat
greenhouse heating techno-economic model is presented in
this study. The contribution of the parameters affecting the
heating costs in the total expenses has been put forward.
The economic model can be used for different types of heat
sources and allows making a comparison easily. According
to the results, the main operating cost is the heating cost.
According to the parametric study, the effect of the cover
material on the heat losses is very little but the effects of the
night temperature set points have an important effect on the
heat losses.
Kata Kunci: Greenhouse · Greenhouse heating · Technoeconomic model · Climate · Waste to heat
Sumber: Arab J Sci Eng (2016) 41:1895–1905 King Fahd University of Petroleum & Minerals 2016
